metadata.synopsis: First AD line in second phase of Kerri's combat. She's becoming emotionally volatile - losing control altogether.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Go to CTY_Main_A -248; 30; -462) oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_CombatReadyKerriSpirit3) Make kerri reach 50% 4) Next turn as kerri transforms into spirit, will say line

0.speaker: Kerri Evenfield
0.text: That bastard boy will suffer for this. He is mine.
0.context: NodeContext: Angry, bitter - active, combat AD
